description: Retrospective application for installation of air cooling plant in existing "bunker" adjacent to rear parts of 46 Colebrooke Row, at lower ground floor level including the incorporation of louvers to the "bunker".  Also submitted Listed Building Consent application ref: P061593.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The applicant shall carry out a noise assessment following the guidelines contained in BS 4142:1997 "Method for rating industrial noise affecting mixed residential and industrial areas"
The noise survey report and scheme of sound insulation and/or noise control measures shall be submitted to the Local Planning Authority for approval. The plant or equipment shall not be operated until the submitted scheme has been approved by the Local Planning Authority, and the plant may only be operated in accordance with the sound insulation and/or noise control measures approved by the Local Planning Authority. No changes to the implemented scheme will be permitted without the prior consent of the Local Planning Authority.

REASON: In order to protect the amenity of neighbouring commercial premises.
